Joseph Haydn

Sonata in E minor, Hob. XVI:47bis

c. 1765–1767 · Landon 19

Total duration: 12'

  • 1. Adagio
  • 2. Allegro
  • 3. Finale: Tempo di Menuet

This sonata is possibly spurious.

1. Adagio

This movement, transposed to F minor, is also used as the second movement of the sonata in F major (Hob. XVI:47).

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 2.5

2. Allegro

This movement, transposed to F major, is also used as the third movement of the sonata in F major (Hob. XVI:47).

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 2

3. Finale: Tempo di Menuet

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2
